thread.title: Actress Radikaa's daughter to get engaged to Abhimanyu Mithun
thread.title_full: Actress Radikaa's daughter to get engaged to Abhimanyu Mithun

author: Chennai
title: Actress Radikaa's daughter to get engaged to Abhimanyu Mithun
text:
Actress Radikaa's daughter to get engaged to Abhimanyu Mithun Chennai, Sep 11, 2015 (IANS) Veteran southern actress Radikaa's daughter Rayane Radikaa will get engaged to Indian cricketer Abhimanyu Mithun on September 23 in a traditional ceremony here.
"They'll get engaged on September 23. The wedding date is not finalised. Both Rayane and Abhimanyu have been dating for a while and with the approval of both their families, they're finally getting ready to tie the knot," a source close to Radikaa's family told IANS.
Mithun plays in IPL for Royal Challengers Bangalore and has also represented India in a few One-Day International (ODI) matches.
Rayane currently helps her mother in film production.
